annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2 of Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994 Temporary Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Law 11-67, October 26, 1995, law notification 42 DCR 6172).

Section 2 of D.C. Law 17-48, in subsec. (a), substituted “13” for “11”, “9” for “8”, and “with similar responsibilities, and a District government official designated by the Mayor,” for “with similar responsibilities,”.
Section 4(b) of D.C. Law 17-48 provided that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.
